sentences.en: Can you recite the names of all the capital cities of Europe?
sentences.cn: 你能列举出欧洲各国首都的名字 吗 ?
你能背诵这首诗 吗 ?

sentences.en: Come up to the front and recite the poem.
Each child had to recite a poem to the class.
sentences.cn: 每个孩子都得在班上背诵一首诗。

sentences.en: For example the player could recite a spell that triggers some event.
sentences.cn: 例如,玩家可以背出一段符咒来触发什么事件.

sentences.en: He can recite that poem from memory.
sentences.cn: 他能凭记忆背诵那首诗.

sentences.en: He can recite the names of all the capital cities of Europe.
sentences.cn: 他能列举欧洲各国首都的名称.

sentences.en: He can recite the poem fluently.
sentences.cn: 他把那首诗念得琅琅上口.

sentences.en: He can't recite the paragraph, but can do the one that precedes.
sentences.cn: 他不能背诵这一段, 但能背前面的一段.

sentences.en: He could recite seventy long stories without dropping a word.
sentences.cn: 他可以一字不漏地背诵70篇长故事.

sentences.en: He is going to recite a poem.
I do not doubt ( but ) that he can recite it.
sentences.cn: 我相信他能把它背下来.

sentences.en: I repeated them until I could recite seventy stories without dropping a word.
sentences.cn: 我反复背诵,直到我能一词不漏地背出70篇故事来.

sentences.en: It was my turn to recite.
It's your turn to recite, Mr. Kaplan.
sentences.cn: 卡普兰先生, 该轮到你背诵了.

sentences.en: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
sentences.cn: 她背诵了一首学校里学的诗。

背诵；朗诵；详述；背诵的诗

trans.tran_cn: 背诵， 朗诵； 列举， 一一说出
trans.tran_en: to say a poem, piece of literature etc that you have learned, for people to listen to
